name: Duwenbeek
description:
Story:

You are stranded in a bizarre forest below  mountains. Come upon portals which connect different parts of the forest. Discover abandoned buildings and structurs which are not always friendly.

Survive and escape from this place.

Features:

  1.  seven levels
  2. easy controlls
  3. strange turrets
  4. the ability to shoot a magical ball
  5. relaxing music
  6. pixel art

This game was developed by only one person.

This game is under heavy development right now.

Music:
